headline: Stifel Reiterates Buy Rating on Equity Residential (EQR)
summary: Equity Residential (NYSE:EQR) is one of the most undervalued stocks. On June 5, Stifel maintained a Buy rating on EQR with a price target of $69.01. The analysts highlighted that Q2 fundamentals for most lodging REITs are tracking in line with, or modestly surpassing, initial expectations. The analysts noted a modest downward revision in RevPAR […]
